patthana1.1:2.1_2: pacchājātapaccayo, āsevanapaccayo, kammapaccayo, vipākapaccayo, āhārapaccayo, indriyapaccayo,
patthana1.1:2.1_3: jhānapaccayo, maggapaccayo, sampayuttapaccayo, vippayuttapaccayo, atthipaccayo, natthipaccayo,
patthana1.1:4.1: Hetupaccayoti—hetū hetusampayuttakānaṁ dhammānaṁ taṁsamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:5.1_1: ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. Saddāyatanaṁ sotaviññāṇadhātuyā taṁsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṁ
patthana1.1:5.1_3: dhammānaṁ ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. Rasāyatanaṁ jivhāviññāṇadhātuyā taṁsampayuttakānañca
patthana1.1:5.1_4: dhammānaṁ ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. Phoṭṭhabbāyatanaṁ kāyaviññāṇadhātuyā taṁsampayuttakānañca
patthana1.1:5.1_5: dhammānaṁ ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. Rūpāyatanaṁ saddāyatanaṁ gandhāyatanaṁ rasāyatanaṁ
patthana1.1:5.1_6: phoṭṭhabbāyatanaṁ manodhātuyā taṁsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṁ ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:5.1_7: Sabbe dhammā manoviññāṇadhātuyā taṁsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṁ ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:6.1: Yaṁ yaṁ dhammaṁ ārabbha ye ye dhammā uppajjanti cittacetasikā dhammā, te te dhammā tesaṁ tesaṁ dhammānaṁ ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:7.1_1: rūpānaṁ adhipatipaccayena paccayo. Vīriyādhipati vīriyasampayuttakānaṁ dhammānaṁ
patthana1.1:7.1_2: taṁsamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ adhipatipaccayena paccayo. Cittādhipati cittasampayuttakānaṁ
patthana1.1:7.1_3: dhammānaṁ taṁsamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ adhipatipaccayena paccayo. Vīmaṁsādhipati vīmaṁsasampayuttakānaṁ
patthana1.1:8.1: Yaṁ yaṁ dhammaṁ garuṁ katvā ye ye dhammā uppajjanti cittacetasikā dhammā, te te dhammā tesaṁ tesaṁ dhammānaṁ adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:9.1_0: Anantarapaccayoti—cakkhuviññāṇadhātu taṁsampayuttakā ca dhammā manodhātuyā taṁsampayuttakānañca
patthana1.1:9.1_1: dhammānaṁ anantarapaccayena paccayo. Manodhātu taṁsampayuttakā ca dhammā manoviññāṇadhātuyā

patthana1.1:10.1_1: anantarapaccayena paccayo. Manodhātu taṁsampayuttakā ca dhammā manoviññāṇadhātuyā
patthana1.1:11.1_0: Ghānaviññāṇadhātu taṁsampayuttakā ca dhammā manodhātuyā taṁsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṁ
patthana1.1:11.1_1: anantarapaccayena paccayo. Manodhātu taṁsampayuttakā ca dhammā manoviññāṇadhātuyā
patthana1.1:12.1_0: Jivhāviññāṇadhātu taṁsampayuttakā ca dhammā manodhātuyā taṁsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṁ
patthana1.1:12.1_1: anantarapaccayena paccayo. Manodhātu taṁsampayuttakā ca dhammā manoviññāṇadhātuyā
patthana1.1:13.1_0: Kāyaviññāṇadhātu taṁsampayuttakā ca dhammā manodhātuyā taṁsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṁ
patthana1.1:13.1_1: anantarapaccayena paccayo. Manodhātu taṁsampayuttakā ca dhammā manoviññāṇadhātuyā

patthana1.1:16.1_2: anantarapaccayena paccayo. Purimā purimā abyākatā dhammā pacchimānaṁ pacchimānaṁ

patthana1.1:18.1_0: Samanantarapaccayoti—cakkhuviññāṇadhātu taṁsampayuttakā ca dhammā manodhātuyā taṁsampayuttakānañca

patthana1.1:25.1_1: paccayo. Purimā purimā abyākatā dhammā pacchimānaṁ pacchimānaṁ kusalānaṁ dhammānaṁ
patthana1.1:25.1_2: samanantarapaccayena paccayo. Purimā purimā abyākatā dhammā pacchimānaṁ pacchimānaṁ
patthana1.1:26.1: Yesaṁ yesaṁ dhammānaṁ samanantarā ye ye dhammā uppajjanti cittacetasikā dhammā, te te dhammā tesaṁ tesaṁ dhammānaṁ samanantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:27.1_0: Sahajātapaccayoti—cattāro khandhā arūpino aññamaññaṁ sahajātapaccayena paccayo. Cattāro
patthana1.1:27.1_1: mahābhūtā aññamaññaṁ sahajātapaccayena paccayo. Okkantikkhaṇe nāmarūpaṁ aññamaññaṁ
patthana1.1:27.1_2: sahajātapaccayena paccayo. Cittacetasikā dhammā cittasamuṭṭhānānaṁ rūpānaṁ sahajātapaccayena
patthana1.1:27.1_3: paccayo. Mahābhūtā upādārūpānaṁ sahajātapaccayena paccayo. Rūpino dhammā arūpīnaṁ
patthana1.1:27.1_4: dhammānaṁ kiñci kāle sahajātapaccayena paccayo, kiñci kāle na sahajātapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:28.1: Aññamaññapaccayoti—cattāro khandhā arūpino aññamaññapaccayena paccayo. Cattāro mahābhūtā aññamaññapaccayena paccayo. Okkantikkhaṇe nāmarūpaṁ aññamaññapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:29.1_0: Nissayapaccayoti—cattāro khandhā arūpino aññamaññaṁ nissayapaccayena paccayo. Cattāro
patthana1.1:29.1_1: mahābhūtā aññamaññaṁ nissayapaccayena paccayo. Okkantikkhaṇe nāmarūpaṁ aññamaññaṁ
patthana1.1:29.1_2: nissayapaccayena paccayo. Cittacetasikā dhammā cittasamuṭṭhānānaṁ rūpānaṁ nissayapaccayena
patthana1.1:30.1_1: paccayo. Sotāyatanaṁ sotaviññāṇadhātuyā taṁsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṁ nissayapaccayena
patthana1.1:30.1_2: paccayo. Ghānāyatanaṁ ghānaviññāṇadhātuyā taṁsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṁ nissayapaccayena
patthana1.1:30.1_3: paccayo. Jivhāyatanaṁ jivhāviññāṇadhātuyā taṁsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṁ nissayapaccayena
patthana1.1:30.1_4: paccayo. Kāyāyatanaṁ kāyaviññāṇadhātuyā taṁsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṁ nissayapaccayena
patthana1.1:30.1_5: paccayo. Yaṁ rūpaṁ nissāya manodhātu ca manoviññāṇadhātu ca vattanti, taṁ rūpaṁ manodhātuyā
patthana1.1:30.1_6: ca manoviññāṇadhātuyā ca taṁsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṁ nissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:31.1_0: Upanissayapaccayoti—purimā purimā kusalā dhammā pacchimānaṁ pacchimānaṁ kusalānaṁ
patthana1.1:31.1_1: dhammānaṁ upanissayapaccayena paccayo. Purimā purimā kusalā dhammā pacchimānaṁ pacchimānaṁ
patthana1.1:31.1_2: akusalānaṁ dhammānaṁ kesañci upanissayapaccayena paccayo. Purimā purimā kusalā dhammā
patthana1.1:31.1_3: pacchimānaṁ pacchimānaṁ abyākatānaṁ dhammānaṁ upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:32.1_0: Purimā purimā akusalā dhammā pacchimānaṁ pacchimānaṁ akusalānaṁ dhammānaṁ upanissayapaccayena
patthana1.1:32.1_1: paccayo. Purimā purimā akusalā dhammā pacchimānaṁ pacchimānaṁ kusalānaṁ dhammānaṁ
patthana1.1:32.1_2: kesañci upanissayapaccayena paccayo. Purimā purimā akusalā dhammā pacchimānaṁ pacchimānaṁ
patthana1.1:33.1_0: Purimā purimā abyākatā dhammā pacchimānaṁ pacchimānaṁ abyākatānaṁ dhammānaṁ upanissayapaccayena
patthana1.1:33.1_1: paccayo. Purimā purimā abyākatā dhammā pacchimānaṁ pacchimānaṁ kusalānaṁ dhammānaṁ
patthana1.1:33.1_2: upanissayapaccayena paccayo. Purimā purimā abyākatā dhammā pacchimānaṁ pacchimānaṁ
patthana1.1:34.1: Utubhojanampi upanissayapaccayena paccayo. Puggalopi upanissayapaccayena paccayo. Senāsanampi upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:35.1_1: purejātapaccayena paccayo. Sotāyatanaṁ sotaviññāṇadhātuyā taṁsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṁ
patthana1.1:35.1_3: dhammānaṁ purejātapaccayena paccayo. Jivhāyatanaṁ jivhāviññāṇadhātuyā taṁsampayuttakānañca
patthana1.1:35.1_4: dhammānaṁ purejātapaccayena paccayo. Kāyāyatanaṁ kāyaviññāṇadhātuyā taṁsampayuttakānañca
patthana1.1:36.1_1: paccayo. Saddāyatanaṁ sotaviññāṇadhātuyā taṁsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṁ purejātapaccayena
patthana1.1:36.1_2: paccayo. Gandhāyatanaṁ ghānaviññāṇadhātuyā taṁsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṁ purejātapaccayena
patthana1.1:36.1_3: paccayo. Rasāyatanaṁ jivhāviññāṇadhātuyā taṁsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṁ purejātapaccayena
patthana1.1:36.1_4: paccayo. Phoṭṭhabbāyatanaṁ kāyaviññāṇadhātuyā taṁsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṁ purejātapaccayena
patthana1.1:36.1_5: paccayo. Rūpāyatanaṁ saddāyatanaṁ gandhāyatanaṁ rasāyatanaṁ phoṭṭhabbāyatanaṁ manodhātuyā
patthana1.1:37.1_0: Yaṁ rūpaṁ nissāya manodhātu ca manoviññāṇadhātu ca vattanti, taṁ rūpaṁ manodhātuyā
patthana1.1:37.1_1: taṁsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṁ purejātapaccayena paccayo. Manoviññāṇadhātuyā taṁsampayuttakānañca
patthana1.1:37.1_2: dhammānaṁ kiñci kāle purejātapaccayena paccayo, kiñci kāle na purejātapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:38.1: Pacchājātapaccayoti—pacchājātā cittacetasikā dhammā purejātassa imassa kāyassa pacchājātapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:39.1_0: Āsevanapaccayoti—purimā purimā kusalā dhammā pacchimānaṁ pacchimānaṁ kusalānaṁ dhammānaṁ
patthana1.1:39.1_1: āsevanapaccayena paccayo. Purimā purimā akusalā dhammā pacchimānaṁ pacchimānaṁ akusalānaṁ
patthana1.1:39.1_2: dhammānaṁ āsevanapaccayena paccayo. Purimā purimā kiriyābyākatā dhammā pacchimānaṁ
patthana1.1:40.1_0: Kammapaccayoti—kusalākusalaṁ kammaṁ vipākānaṁ khandhānaṁ kaṭattā ca rūpānaṁ kammapaccayena
patthana1.1:40.1_1: paccayo. Cetanā sampayuttakānaṁ dhammānaṁ taṁsamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:41.1: Vipākapaccayoti—vipākā cattāro khandhā arūpino aññamaññaṁ vipākapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:42.1: Āhārapaccayoti—kabaḷīkāro āhāro imassa kāyassa āhārapaccayena paccayo. Arūpino āhārā sampayuttakānaṁ dhammānaṁ taṁsamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ āhārapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:43.1_1: indriyapaccayena paccayo. Sotindriyaṁ sotaviññāṇadhātuyā taṁsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṁ
patthana1.1:43.1_2: indriyapaccayena paccayo. Ghānindriyaṁ ghānaviññāṇadhātuyā taṁsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṁ
patthana1.1:43.1_3: indriyapaccayena paccayo. Jivhindriyaṁ jivhāviññāṇadhātuyā taṁsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṁ
patthana1.1:43.1_4: indriyapaccayena paccayo. Kāyindriyaṁ kāyaviññāṇadhātuyā taṁsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṁ
patthana1.1:44.1: Arūpino indriyā sampayuttakānaṁ dhammānaṁ taṁsamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ indriyapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:45.1: Jhānapaccayoti—jhānaṅgāni jhānasampayuttakānaṁ dhammānaṁ taṁsamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ jhānapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:46.1: Maggapaccayoti—maggaṅgāni maggasampayuttakānaṁ dhammānaṁ taṁsamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ maggapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:47.1: Sampayuttapaccayoti—cattāro khandhā arūpino aññamaññaṁ sampayuttapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:48.1: Vippayuttapaccayoti—rūpino dhammā arūpīnaṁ dhammānaṁ vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. Arūpino dhammā rūpīnaṁ dhammānaṁ vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:49.1_0: Atthipaccayoti—cattāro khandhā arūpino aññamaññaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo. Cattāro
patthana1.1:49.1_1: mahābhūtā aññamaññaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo. Okkantikkhaṇe nāmarūpaṁ aññamaññaṁ atthipaccayena
patthana1.1:49.1_2: paccayo. Cittacetasikā dhammā cittasamuṭṭhānānaṁ rūpānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:50.1_1: paccayo. Sotāyatanaṁ sotaviññāṇadhātuyā taṁsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṁ atthipaccayena
patthana1.1:50.1_2: paccayo. Ghānāyatanaṁ ghānaviññāṇadhātuyā taṁsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṁ atthipaccayena
patthana1.1:50.1_3: paccayo. Jivhāyatanaṁ jivhāviññāṇadhātuyā taṁsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṁ atthipaccayena
patthana1.1:50.1_4: paccayo. Kāyāyatanaṁ kāyaviññāṇadhātuyā taṁsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:51.1_0: Rūpāyatanaṁ cakkhuviññāṇadhātuyā taṁsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:51.1_1: Saddāyatanaṁ sotaviññāṇadhātuyā taṁsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:51.1_2: Gandhāyatanaṁ ghānaviññāṇadhātuyā taṁsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:51.1_3: Rasāyatanaṁ jivhāviññāṇadhātuyā taṁsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:51.1_5: paccayo. Rūpāyatanaṁ saddāyatanaṁ gandhāyatanaṁ rasāyatanaṁ phoṭṭhabbāyatanaṁ manodhātuyā
patthana1.1:52.1: Yaṁ rūpaṁ nissāya manodhātu ca manoviññāṇadhātu ca vattanti, taṁ rūpaṁ manodhātuyā ca manoviññāṇadhātuyā ca taṁsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:53.1: Natthipaccayoti—samanantaraniruddhā cittacetasikā dhammā paṭuppannānaṁ cittacetasikānaṁ dhammānaṁ natthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:54.1: Vigatapaccayoti—samanantaravigatā cittacetasikā dhammā paṭuppannānaṁ cittacetasikānaṁ dhammānaṁ vigatapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:55.1_0: Avigatapaccayoti—cattāro khandhā arūpino aññamaññaṁ avigatapaccayena paccayo. Cattāro
patthana1.1:55.1_1: mahābhūtā aññamaññaṁ avigatapaccayena paccayo. Okkantikkhaṇe nāmarūpaṁ aññamaññaṁ
patthana1.1:55.1_2: avigatapaccayena paccayo. Cittacetasikā dhammā cittasamuṭṭhānānaṁ rūpānaṁ avigatapaccayena
patthana1.1:56.1_1: paccayo. Sotāyatanaṁ sotaviññāṇadhātuyā taṁsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṁ avigatapaccayena
patthana1.1:56.1_2: paccayo. Ghānāyatanaṁ ghānaviññāṇadhātuyā taṁsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṁ avigatapaccayena
patthana1.1:56.1_3: paccayo. Jivhāyatanaṁ jivhāviññāṇadhātuyā taṁsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṁ avigatapaccayena
patthana1.1:56.1_4: paccayo. Kāyāyatanaṁ kāyaviññāṇadhātuyā taṁsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṁ avigatapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:57.1_1: paccayo. Saddāyatanaṁ sotaviññāṇadhātuyā taṁsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṁ avigatapaccayena
patthana1.1:57.1_2: paccayo. Gandhāyatanaṁ ghānaviññāṇadhātuyā taṁsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṁ avigatapaccayena
patthana1.1:57.1_3: paccayo. Rasāyatanaṁ jivhāviññāṇadhātuyā taṁsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṁ avigatapaccayena
patthana1.1:57.1_4: paccayo. Phoṭṭhabbāyatanaṁ kāyaviññāṇadhātuyā taṁsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṁ avigatapaccayena
patthana1.1:57.1_5: paccayo. Rūpāyatanaṁ saddāyatanaṁ gandhāyatanaṁ rasāyatanaṁ phoṭṭhabbāyatanaṁ manodhātuyā
patthana1.1:58.1: Yaṁ rūpaṁ nissāya manodhātu ca manoviññāṇadhātu ca vattanti, taṁ rūpaṁ manodhātuyā ca manoviññāṇadhātuyā ca taṁsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṁ avigatapaccayena paccayo.

patthana1.1:68.1: Siyā kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca kusalo dhammo uppajjeyya ārammaṇapaccayā.
patthana1.1:69.1: (Yathā hetupaccayo vitthārito, evaṁ ārammaṇapaccayopi vitthāretabbo vācanāmaggena.)
patthana1.1:70.1_0: Siyā kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca kusalo dhammo uppajjeyya adhipatipaccayā … anantarapaccayā
patthana1.1:71.1_0: Siyā kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca kusalo dhammo uppajjeyya avigatapaccayā …pe… akusalaṁ
patthana1.1:71.1_1: dhammaṁ paṭicca … abyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca … kusalañca abyākatañca dhammaṁ paṭicca
patthana1.1:71.1_2: … akusalañca abyākatañca dhammaṁ paṭicca … kusalañca akusalañca dhammaṁ paṭicca …
patthana1.1:71.1_3: kusalañca akusalañca abyākatañca dhammaṁ paṭicca kusalo dhammo uppajjeyya … akusalo
patthana1.1:71.1_4: dhammo uppajjeyya … abyākato dhammo uppajjeyya … kusalo ca abyākato ca dhammā uppajjeyyuṁ
patthana1.1:71.1_5: … akusalo ca abyākato ca dhammā uppajjeyyuṁ … kusalo ca akusalo ca dhammā uppajjeyyuṁ
patthana1.1:71.1_6: … kusalo ca akusalo ca abyākato ca dhammā uppajjeyyuṁ avigatapaccayā.
patthana1.1:72.1: (Yathā hetupaccayo vitthārito, evaṁ avigatapaccayopi vitthāretabbo vācanāmaggena.)
patthana1.1:74.1_0: Siyā kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca kusalo dhammo uppajjeyya hetupaccayā ārammaṇapaccayā
patthana1.1:74.1_1: …pe… siyā kusalañca akusalañca abyākatañca dhammaṁ paṭicca kusalo ca akusalo ca abyākato
patthana1.1:75.1: Siyā kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca kusalo dhammo uppajjeyya hetupaccayā adhipatipaccayā …pe… hetupaccayā anantarapaccayā … hetupaccayā samanantarapaccayā …pe… hetupaccayā avigatapaccayā.
patthana1.1:77.1_0: Siyā kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca kusalo dhammo uppajjeyya hetupaccayā ārammaṇapaccayā
patthana1.1:79.1: Siyā kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca kusalo dhammo uppajjeyya hetupaccayā ārammaṇapaccayā adhipatipaccayā anantarapaccayā …pe… hetupaccayā ārammaṇapaccayā adhipatipaccayā avigatapaccayā.
patthana1.1:81.1: (Pañcamūlakādikā saṅkhittā. Ekamūlakaṁ, dumūlakaṁ, timūlakaṁ, catumūlakaṁ, pañcamūlakaṁ, sabbamūlakaṁ asammuyhantena vitthāretabbaṁ.)
patthana1.1:83.1: Siyā kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca kusalo dhammo uppajjeyya ārammaṇapaccayā hetupaccayā … ārammaṇapaccayā adhipatipaccayā …pe… ārammaṇapaccayā avigatapaccayā.
patthana1.1:84.1_0: Siyā kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca kusalo dhammo uppajjeyya adhipatipaccayā … anantarapaccayā
patthana1.1:84.1_2: … avigatapaccayā ārammaṇapaccayā … avigatapaccayā adhipatipaccayā …pe… avigatapaccayā vigatapaccayā.
patthana1.1:86.1_0: Siyā kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca kusalo dhammo uppajjeyya avigatapaccayā hetupaccayā
patthana1.1:86.1_1: ārammaṇapaccayā … avigatapaccayā hetupaccayā adhipatipaccayā … avigatapaccayā hetupaccayā
patthana1.1:87.1_0: Siyā kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca kusalo dhammo uppajjeyya avigatapaccayā hetupaccayā
patthana1.1:87.1_1: ārammaṇapaccayā adhipatipaccayā … avigatapaccayā hetupaccayā ārammaṇapaccayā anantarapaccayā …pe… vigatapaccayā.
patthana1.1:88.1: (Ekekassa padassa ekamūlakaṁ, dumūlakaṁ, timūlakaṁ, catumūlakaṁ, pañcamūlakaṁ, sabbamūlakaṁ asammuyhantena vitthāretabbaṁ.)
patthana1.1:90.1: Siyā kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca kusalo dhammo uppajjeyya nahetupaccayā.
patthana1.1:91.1: (Yathā anulome hetupaccayo vitthārito, evaṁ paccanīyepi nahetupaccayo vitthāretabbo.)
patthana1.1:92.1_0: Siyā kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca kusalo dhammo uppajjeyya naārammaṇapaccayā … naadhipatipaccayā
patthana1.1:93.1: Siyā kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca kusalo dhammo uppajjeyya nahetupaccayā naārammaṇapaccayā ….
patthana1.1:94.1: (Yathā anulome ekekassa padassa ekamūlakaṁ, dumūlakaṁ, timūlakaṁ, catumūlakaṁ, yāva tevīsatimūlakaṁ evaṁ paccanīyepi vitthāretabbaṁ.)
patthana1.1:96.1: Siyā kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca kusalo dhammo uppajjeyya hetupaccayā naārammaṇapaccayā … siyā kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca akusalo dhammo uppajjeyya hetupaccayā naārammaṇapaccayā.
patthana1.1:97.1: (Yathā anulome hetupaccayo vitthārito, evaṁ anulomapaccanīyepi padaṁ vitthāretabbaṁ.)
patthana1.1:98.1: Siyā kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca kusalo dhammo uppajjeyya hetupaccayā naadhipatipaccayā … hetupaccayā naanantarapaccayā …pe… hetupaccayā noavigatapaccayā.
patthana1.1:99.1_0: Siyā kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca kusalo dhammo uppajjeyya hetupaccayā ārammaṇapaccayā
patthana1.1:100.1: Hetupaccayā ārammaṇapaccayā adhipatipaccayā naanantarapaccayā …pe… hetupaccayā ārammaṇapaccayā adhipatipaccayā noavigatapaccayā.
patthana1.1:101.1: Hetupaccayā ārammaṇapaccayā adhipatipaccayā anantarapaccayā nasamanantarapaccayā …pe… hetupaccayā ārammaṇapaccayā adhipatipaccayā anantarapaccayā noavigatapaccayā …pe….
patthana1.1:102.1_0: Hetupaccayā ārammaṇapaccayā adhipatipaccayā anantarapaccayā samanantarapaccayā sahajātapaccayā
patthana1.1:102.1_2: āsevanapaccayā kammapaccayā vipākapaccayā āhārapaccayā indriyapaccayā jhānapaccayā
patthana1.1:102.1_3: maggapaccayā sampayuttapaccayā vippayuttapaccayā atthipaccayā natthipaccayā vigatapaccayā noavigatapaccayā.
patthana1.1:103.1_0: Siyā kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca kusalo dhammo uppajjeyya ārammaṇapaccayā … adhipatipaccayā
patthana1.1:104.1: Avigatapaccayā hetupaccayā naārammaṇapaccayā …pe… avigatapaccayā hetupaccayā novigatapaccayā.
patthana1.1:105.1: Avigatapaccayā hetupaccayā ārammaṇapaccayā naadhipatipaccayā …pe… avigatapaccayā hetupaccayā ārammaṇapaccayā novigatapaccayā.
patthana1.1:106.1: Avigatapaccayā hetupaccayā ārammaṇapaccayā adhipatipaccayā anantarapaccayā samanantarapaccayā sahajātapaccayā …pe… novigatapaccayā.
patthana1.1:108.1_0: Siyā kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca kusalo dhammo uppajjeyya nahetupaccayā ārammaṇapaccayā.
patthana1.1:108.1_1: Siyā kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca kusalo dhammo uppajjeyya nahetupaccayā adhipatipaccayā
patthana1.1:109.1: Siyā kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca kusalo dhammo uppajjeyya nahetupaccayā naārammaṇapaccayā adhipatipaccayā …pe… avigatapaccayā.
patthana1.1:111.1: Nahetupaccayā naārammaṇapaccayā naadhipatipaccayā naanantarapaccayā nasamanantarapaccayā …pe… noatthipaccayā nonatthipaccayā novigatapaccayā avigatapaccayā.
patthana1.1:112.1: Siyā kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca kusalo dhammo uppajjeyya naārammaṇapaccayā hetupaccayā.
patthana1.1:113.1_0: Siyā kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca kusalo dhammo uppajjeyya naārammaṇapaccayā adhipatipaccayā
patthana1.1:114.1: Noavigatapaccayā nahetupaccayā ārammaṇapaccayā …pe… noavigatapaccayā nahetupaccayā vigatapaccayā.
patthana1.1:115.1: Noavigatapaccayā nahetupaccayā naārammaṇapaccayā naadhipatipaccayā …pe… noatthipaccayā nonatthipaccayā vigatapaccayā.
